name: Renamed BAT File
summary: Learn about .BA_ files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: BA_ files are also used by some application installers so that the user doesn't run the file instead of an intended and more obvious installer file such as Setup.exe.

NOTE: A BA_ file may also be a compressed BAT file that can be expanded using Microsoft's Expand command line utility. This file type uses the underscore convention in the same manner as .EX_ and .DL_ files.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
